trans-unit.source: Converts an <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity> instance to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換<xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity>用於指定類型的執行個體。</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.XamlIntegration.EndpointIdentityConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.XamlIntegration.EndpointIdentityConverter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether the converter can convert an <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity> instance to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，判斷轉換子是否可以轉換<xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity>用於指定類型的執行個體。</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity>

trans-unit.source: A type descriptor context that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: 提供格式內容的型別描述項內容。

trans-unit.source: The type you want to convert to.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the converter can perform the conversion requested; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果轉換子可以執行轉換的要求。否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given object to the specified type, using the specified context and culture information.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的物件轉換成指定的型別，並使用指定的內容和文化特性資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
If <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is passed, the current culture is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>傳遞，則目前會假設文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The type to convert the `value` parameter to.
